@notice Starts a staking session for a finit _period of
 time, starting from _startTime. The _totalReward of
 CWS tokens will be distributed in every second. It allows to claim a
 a _generation Seascape NFT.

constructor.details: CWS is not changable after contract deployment.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setNftFactory(address).details: sets an nft factory, a smartcontract that mints tokens. the nft factory should give a permission on it's own side to this contract too.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimNft(uint256).notice: Mints an NFT for staker. One NFT per session, per token. and should be a deposit

claimable(uint256,address).notice: Returns amount of CWS Tokens that _address could claim.

earned(uint256,address).notice: Returns amount of CWS Tokens earned by _address

stakedBalance(uint256).notice: Returns total amount of Staked LP Tokens

stakedBalanceOf(uint256,address).notice: Returns amount of Token staked by _owner

startSession(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Starts a staking session for a finit _period of time, starting from _startTime. The _totalReward of CWS tokens will be distributed in every second. It allows to claim a a _generation Seascape NFT.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws _amount of LP token of type _token out of Staking contract.

userdoc.notice: Contract is attached to Seascape Nft Factory
